text: Yesterday, I woke up around 5AM, and I got to see Rushia stream, I went to bed 20 hours later, and got to see Rushia getting her trident before I fell asleep. Today I woke up to see Rushia streaming again, and so to me it seems like my schedule was perfect in every way

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Another stream and a great encore later of an anticipated party for the 600000 subs... :_るんるん: 

Well... A double party: the another one was the Trident trophy obtained at undersea in previous stream. :_きゅん:

And a great selection of Mashimaro read...
Too sad my message was not read :_あせり: , but also I can't know how Mashimaro works. It's possible because only can write in simple english (that's because I speak spanish) 

But well... It was also a good ending for a Super Sunday. :_ちょうちょ:

Rushia-hime, you deserved it... Congratulations :_ハート:
